column1: '''The Ruined Enchanter: A Fairy Ballad''' is the title of an unfinished and [[Index:Unpublished material
column2: unpublished]] poem by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], written on the verso of a letter (dated [[11 November]] [[1919]]) to Tolkien from the [[Wikipedia:Ministry of Pensions and National Insurance#Ministry of Pensions
